text:
A cameo to look out for

Paul Feig, the director of the new Ghostbusters film, has revealed that Bill Murray is to make a cameo appearance in the forthcoming reboot. Murray, 65, led an all star cast in the franchise’s original two films, but in recent years he has strongly opposed any follow on or remake. The rebooted movie sees Kate McKinnon, Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Wiig, and Leslie Jones play the paranormal fighting gang.

— PTI
title: ENT-MURRAY
